derivation: from a compound of G5259 (ὑποτύπωσις) and a derivative of G5179 (ὑποτύπωσις);
strongs_def: typification under (after), i.e. (concretely) a sketch (figuratively) for imitation
outline:
1. an outline, sketch, brief and summary exposition
  2. an example, pattern
    1. for an example of those who should hereafter believe
    2. to show by the example of my conversation that the same grace which I had obtained would not be wanting also to those who should hereafter believe
